        file - The AKB file to load.
        Throws:
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologyCreationException - If the ontology cannot be loaded.

                 it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologyChangeException,

                 it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.InconsistencyException,
                 it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.ReasoningInterruptedException,
                 it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologyCreationException
        Saves the ADSS state to file.
        Throws:
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologySaveException - If the ontology cannot be saved.
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If the file cannot be refreshed.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologyChangeException - If the axiom cannot be added.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.ParsingErrorException - If the expression is invalid.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologyChangeException - If the axiom cannot be added.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.NoSuchEntityException - If one of the involved entities does not exist or if the object is not correctly annotated.
        java.io.IOException - If an object cannot be serialized or the output file cannot be created.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.ReasoningInterruptedException - If the reasoning is interrupted.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.InconsistencyException - If the ontology is inconsistent.
        it.polito.security.ontologies.exceptions.OntologyCreationException
